org.apache.taverna.platform.report

Class StatusReport<SUBJECT extends Ported,PARENT extends StatusReport<?,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.platform.report.StatusReport<SUBJECT,PARENT>
  • Type Parameters:
    SUBJECT - the WorkflowBean that the report is about
    PARENT - the parent report type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActivityReport, ProcessorReport, WorkflowReport

    public class StatusReport<SUBJECT extends Ported,PARENT extends StatusReport<?,?>>
extends Object
    Report about the State of a workflow component.
    Author:
    David Withers

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StatusReport(SUBJECT subject)
      Constructs a new StatusReport for the subject and sets the created date to the current date.

        Returns null if this report has no parent.

        Returns:
        the parent report

      • setParentReport

        public void setParentReport(PARENT parentReport)
        Sets the parent report.

        Can be null if this report has no parent.

        Parameters:
        workflowReport - the parent report

      • getState

        public State getState()
        Returns the current State.

        A state can be CREATED, RUNNING, COMPLETED, PAUSED, CANCELLED or FAILED.

        Returns:
        the current State

      • getStartedDate

        public Date getStartedDate()
        Returns the date that the status changed to RUNNING.

        If the status has never been RUNNING null is returned.

        Returns:
        the date that the status changed to started

      • setStartedDate

        Sets the date that the status changed to RUNNING.
        Parameters:
        startedDate - the date that the status changed to RUNNING

      • getPausedDate

        public Date getPausedDate()
        Returns the date that the status last changed to PAUSED.

        If the status has never been PAUSED null is returned.

        Returns:
        the date that the status last changed to PAUSED

      • getResumedDate

        public Date getResumedDate()
        Returns the date that the status last changed form PAUSED to RUNNING.

        If the status has never changed form PAUSED to RUNNING null is returned.

        Returns:
        the date that the status last changed form PAUSED to RUNNING

        public Date getCancelledDate()
        Returns the date that the status changed to CANCELLED.

        public Date getFailedDate()
        Returns the date that the status changed to FAILED. If the status has never been FAILED null is returned.
        Returns:
        the date that the status changed to failed

      • getPausedDates

        public List<Date> getPausedDates()
        Returns the dates that the status changed to PAUSED.

        If the status has never been PAUSED an empty list is returned.

        Returns:
        the dates that the status was paused

      • getResumedDates

        public List<Date> getResumedDates()
        Returns the dates that the status changed from PAUSED to RUNNING.

        If the status has never changed from PAUSED to RUNNING an empty list is returned.

        Returns:
        the dates that the status was resumed

        public NavigableSet<Invocation> getInvocations()
        Returns the invocations.
        Returns:
        the invocations

      • outputAdded

        public void outputAdded(Path path,
                        String portName,
                        int[] index)
        Informs the report that an output value has been added.

        Any ReportListeners registered with this report will be notified that an output value has been added.

        Parameters:
        path - the path that the value was added to
        portName - the port that the value belongs to
        index - the position of the value
